channel.title: 150K Members
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=150000
Osht, 150K members and counting. It's sad that only like 0.001% of them actually know what they're doing.

item.title: 150K Members
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Yea. I was only around for 2 years, and it's amazing how much they marketed rs membership and how shitty they made f2p (come on, the highest bow is a maple? fuck you, Jagex).

Well, it’s not like they made FTP shitty, it’s more like they just stopped updating it. When they announced the new arrows and bows (on classic) I logged on to try them, then saw that they were members only. That sucked. Especially after they had just released different metal pickaxes on FTP and raised my expectations. The Rune pickaxe was sikkk on classic because it tried to hit the rock twelve times for you, anyway, Rest In Peace Runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: 150K Members
item.dc:creator: @bahbahblacksheep bahbahblacksheep
item.description:
@bahbahblacksheep wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:10, topic:123639”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=173435.msg1600642#msg1600642 date=1184572628]
Good point. I digress but when members first came out on Runescape I seriously doubted anybody would do it. I was really pissed that Jagex was letting people make strength potions without red spider eggs, as that (herblaw) was the first real benefit of membership, and I thought 5$ was unreasonable.
[/quote]

Yea. I was only around for 2 years, and it’s amazing how much they marketed rs membership and how shitty they made f2p (come on, the highest bow is a maple? fuck you, Jagex).[/quote]

your gay, shut up.

Read full topic

item.title: 150K Members
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

PaulT:

How could you think that? 150k Runescapers was probably achieved in early '02 or late '01. I myself remember creating masses of different characters to get the free stuff that you started with as each different class and then transferring it to my main, an “Adventurer”.

Yes, which is why I was wondering wtf the post was about. Not to mention ‘members’ in RS carries a different meaning than simply ‘players.’

Read full topic
